definition: deposited or arranged in horizontal layers
details:
adjective
- deposited or arranged in horizontal layers
= example: deposited or arranged in horizontal layers
= synonyms: bedded
- (used of society) socially hierarchical
= example: (used of society) socially hierarchical
= synonyms: class-conscious
- arranged in a sequence of grades or ranks
= example: arranged in a sequence of grades or ranks
= synonyms: graded, ranked
